text: Minsk National Airport (formerly known as Minsk-2) (, ; ) is the main international airport in Belarus, located 42 km (26 mi) to the east of the capital Minsk, geographically lying in the territory of . On August 9, 2021, head of the airport Vyacheslav Khoroneko was put in the of the USA. He got a punishment as a person who made it possible to land Ryanair Flight 4978 at the airport on May 23, 2021. ==References== Category:Airports in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Belarus
title: Minsk National Airport
